title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4061 - Starting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4061 - Starting

State Regulations
§ 4061.1 - Horse must be ready at start
§ 4061.2 - Races started by flag
§ 4061.3 - Other methods of starting require approval

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 4061

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1934, ch. 310, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
